pr_title: [FLINK-17612][python][sql-client] add the parse logic of Python command line options to CliOptionsParser in SQL Client.

timeline.message: [FLINK-17612][python][sql-client] add the parse logic of Python command line options to CliOptionsParser in SQL Client.

timeline.bodyText: Change to Failed to parse the Python command line options?
timeline.author: dianfu

timeline.bodyText:
could use the enrich method defined in Environment as following:
final Environment sessionEnvWithPythonConfiguration = Environment.enrich( sessionEnv, options.getPythonConfiguration().toMap(), Collections.emptyMap());
timeline.author: dianfu

replies.bodyText: It seems the enrich() method of the ConfigurationEntry only accepts the configurations that start with "table.". As the python configurations all start with "python.", the enrich method does not work for python configurations.
replies.author: WeiZhong94

timeline.message: update the sql client doc for the python command options
